title: E170 A La Croix Lobotomy and a Big Golden Eye
description:
Let there be fun! We've got a wild ride for you this week as we virtually travel to the southern hemisphere. First Em covers the extremely haunted and messed up Aradale Mental Hospital in Australia. Then Christine takes us over to New Zealand for the also extremely messed up Bain Family murders in Dunedin. We're also pretty sure there's a dancing candelabra involved in both... and that's why we drink!
Please consider supporting the companies that support us!
Explore your creativity and get 2 free months of Premium Membership at Skillshare.com/DRINK2
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
